title: Journal on letterpress
content:
The May issue of Galley Gab, an online journal devoted to letterpress, is now available to download at:

[http://www.galleygab.net](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822051639/http:/www.galleygab.net/ "http://www.galleygab.net")
author: mikeoconnor

comments.content: Why the pages are yellowish, Mr O'Connor ?

And why does Galley Gab ignore german letterpress printers who try to go into deeper contact to their english colleagues since two years to buy from and offer to lead types?

Georg  
 [www.bleisetzer.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20130822051639/http:/www.bleisetzer.de/ "www.bleisetzer.de")
